creator: hostmaster@esknet.ee
text:
When executing startup.sh, it will show:
Using CATALINA_BASE:   /downloads/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.4
Using CATALINA_HOME:   /downloads/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.4
Using CATALINA_TMPDIR: /downloads/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.4/temp
Using JAVA_HOME:       /j2sdk1.4.0_01
and then returns to prompt [root@pc bin]#
catalina.out will give:
Exception java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: requested 32760 bytes
What to do, I am completely confused.

This works for me. Check your VM parameters (and in particular the memory
options). Also try to run the default installation to see if it works. This is
an issue which should be discussed tomcat-user at this point.
creator: remm@apache.org
